description:
Do you Dread Networking?

The truth is, there are LOTS of other people who do not love networking and this system allows YOU to make THEM feel much better about being at the Networking Event. By doing so you become THAT person – the one everyone wants to talk to!

You will find out exactly what to do to stand out and get noticed in a way that feels authentic and aligns with your core goal – to meet new people and foster relationships that are professionally win/win/win.

This course will help you:

- Learn how to take control of your networking experience, eliminate FEAR, and be a Confident and Competent Networker.

- Access the Secrets to making every in-person networking event a profit pool for your business.

- Understand how to avoid the biggest mistakes made by networking novices that cost them money rather than increasing their profits.

Armed with your knowledge and expertise and these tips for success, you will finally learn how to use Social Media to make connections that will make you more money!
title: Social Networking for Conferences and Events
